column5: O.K...  Now that I have your attention....  Just Google "Lake Nipissing Girls" and see who comes up #1......!!!! Then you need to click on the link to understand the humour.  It may surprise and entertain you...  There is nothing quite like the strange workings of the internet.....          the cap't
So....we are the Nipissing girls huh ??  I think I like the "Crayola Crew" handle better.....
The new site looks good Kevin.  Jeff.
Harr Harr!!  See ya in the fall Kev.  Hope all is honky dory!!  HD
Looks real good...Congrates on makin it to the TOP...  Will
Why were you Googling "Lake Nipissing Girls" in the first place? What were you hoping to find?  Inquiring minds want to know.
LOL, now how did that happen   Lake Nipissing Girls google link click here

Yep, the site's looking good Kevin and Leslie. Congrats on that.  There are at least two pics of OFC gatherings used as page headers. The one in Terry's link is the very first OFC Lakair gathering. It was dubbed the Crayola Invitational undoubtedly because of the presence of so many colouful characters. The other header where we're pictured on the dock is a newer pic......probably 4-5 years ago as I see TNT (Todd) in there.  Good memories.  edit:  I must add that the biggest surprise of that first gathering was the unexpected appearance of Spiel. He and Marty hit it off real good! There were even bears up there then banging on vans. I didn't witness too much of that though as I was busy and tied up.
"Fresh air is good for you, Lakair is better."  Roy Boudreau  You're punny Roy.
Hmmmmm .... Girls with Beards.   Interesting.  Maybe some of them will be there next week.  Could be a real fun time ya know.
Better not let Leslie catch you surfing the net for "Nipissing" porn sites or you might find yourself having shore lunches over on that rock island alone...  Just kidding Kevin...
Terry I was too lazy to google...man you have some crazy computer skills!  Kevin and Leslie the site looks great, see you next week.
Ya I was also impressed, freaked me out a bit lmao. Gonna have to save that one lol

You've done some great work on the site Kevin & Leslie.   Lots of nice features and some that other sites just don't have.  Will be good to get more pics posted in all the categories you have.     Well done and I'm anxious to see it grow.
